A WAY TO ADD MORE SPEED TO UTORRENT

1. Download  Cheat Engine.
2. Install Cheat Engine.
3. Run cheat engine while Utorrent is open and downloading.
4. Click the little flashing icon (It will be the one that looks like a pc with a magnifying glass in front of it in the upper left-hand corner.)
5. Select Utorrent from the list.
6. Once utorrent has been selected from the list, select the check box that says "Enable Speedhack".
7. Under that check box you will see a field labeled "Speed". Type 0.5 in that field, if you go any higher then the speed boost will not work on utorrent (I am told that for some people going higher than 0.5 will actually make utorrent crash.)
8. Once all of that has been done, hit apply. You should start to nice a speed increase within 15 seconds.
9. Also, make sure port 45682 is open in your utorrent. You can find that under Preferences > Connection.
If you need more info on how to speed up utorrent you can find videos on youtube.

Also, don't forget to allow seeds. File sharing depends on users sharing individual files with each other so.. the more you seed the faster you download... If you use magnet links everything is shared through a cloud so it is allot harder for someone to tell who is sharing what...
Oh, keep in mind, that even with cheat engine... no amount of speed boosting techniques will help a torrent with a low number of seeders... but it can more than double your dl/ul speeds.
